declarations.comments: Extracts the decoder part of a `GCodec`
declarations.title: decoder

declarations.comments: Extracts the encoder part of a `GCodec`
declarations.title: encoder

declarations.comments:
Changes the `m` and `n` functors used in the codec using the specified
natural transformations.
declarations.title: bihoistGCodec

declarations.comments:
`GCodec` is defined as a `Profunctor` so that `lcmap` can be used to target
specific fields when defining a codec for a product type. This operator
is a convenience for that:

``` purescript
tupleCodec =
  Tuple
    <$> fst ~ fstCodec
    <*> snd ~ sndCodec
```
